wikipedia_page.main: John Stoll (13 December 1913 – 25 June 1990) was a British art director. He won an Academy Award in the category Best Art Direction for the film Lawrence of Arabia. During the 1950s, he worked largely on low-budget British feature films.

link_mentions.page: Academy Award for Best Production Design

response: | John Box, John Stoll and Dario Simoni
*Lawrence of Arabia – Art Direction: John Box and John Stoll; Set Decoration: Dario Simoni
